description: Haruhi enlists the help of Kyon to attempt to investigate what happened to Ryōko, as Haruhi believes it strange that she would transfer without notice. After a fruitless search, Haruhi tells Kyon about her earlier years, and how she changed from an ordinary girl into her present state. Later that day, Itsuki tells Kyon his organization`s theories about Haruhi, and shows him some of his powers within a sealed reality.

titles.title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya V
